description: The terms are a contract between two parties, and it should not be changed unilaterally without consultation of the other party. Services should listen to what their users say and care about, and give them a vote in each substantial change.

name: User Involvement in Changing Terms
subtitle: Are changes proposed as a request for feedback, or imposed unilaterally as a take-it-or-leave-it deal?
title: User Involvement in Changing Terms
